sentences.en: After much discussion we came at a conclusion satisfactory to all.
sentences.cn: 经过充分讨论,我们得出了大家都很满意的结论.

sentences.en: His general state of health is fairly satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 他总的健康情况相当令人满意.

sentences.en: His progress this term has been satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 他这学期的进步令人满意。

sentences.en: I never got a satisfactory answer.
sentences.cn: 我从未得到令我满意的答复。

sentences.en: In fact, I'm sure that's the only satisfactory way out.
sentences.cn: 我想,事实上那是唯一令人满意的出路.

sentences.en: It seemed a very satisfactory arrangement.
sentences.cn: 这似乎是个非常令人满意的安排。
两个解决方案似乎都不合适。

sentences.en: Sales are very satisfactory this month.
sentences.cn: 本月销售情况令人十分满意.

sentences.en: The dispute was brought to a satisfactory termination.
The management of many new colleges was less than satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 很多新建院校的管理不尽人意.

sentences.en: The meeting came to a satisfactory close.
The shop, though small, has a satisfactory variety of goods.
sentences.cn: 这商店虽然小, 货物却很全.
他们的表演尚差强人意.

sentences.en: Theirs had been a happy and satisfactory marriage.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻曾经一直幸福美满。

sentences.en: This arrangement is quite satisfactory, so far as I am concerned.
sentences.cn: 就我来说, 这样的安排很好.

sentences.en: This bicycle is quite satisfactory -- just the thing I want.
sentences.cn: 这辆自行车买得很称心.

words.tran_cn: 令人满意的；令人满足的
满意，满足；赔偿；乐事；赎罪
满足；说服，使相信；使满意，使高兴
充分的,适当的,有能力的,有价值的,好的

trans.tran_en: something that is satisfactory seems good enough for you, or good enough for a particular situation or purpose
